ingredients.item: 2 red peppers, deseeded, cut into small chunks
½ x 4g pack Cooks’ Ingredients Saffron
400g pack frozen essential Waitrose Cooked Seafood Selection

instructions.step: Heat the oil in a large saucepan and fry the shallots, fennel and peppers for 6-8 minutes until beginning to colour, adding the garlic for the last couple of minutes. Crumble the saffron into 1 tbsp boiling water in a small bowl.
Add the fish stock and tomatoes to the pan and bring to a gentle simmer. Cover and cook for 15 minutes.
Stir in the saffron liquid, frozen seafood and parsley and cook for a further 5 minutes until bubbling and piping hot. Season and serve.
